data.title: Who Owns Your Medical Data?
data.summary: The evolving landscape of medical data highlights ownership, privacy concerns, and the need for ethical frameworks in healthcare and digital health.

data.title: Amid deep cuts to the U.S. FDA, experts warn Canadians could lose vital safety information
data.summary: Canadian health experts warn the fallout from thousands of job cuts at the U.S. Food and Drug Administration on April 1 could disrupt the flow of safety information on drugs, medical devices, and food to Canada.

data.title: Bridging the digital divide to improve heart health for all
data.summary: The use of technology-based health solutions, such as fitness trackers, smartwatches and mobile health apps, has shown potential to help people improve management of their cardiovascular health.

data.title: PH targets larger share of health care info market
data.summary: THE country wants to further expand its share of North America's health care outsourcing market, confident of its strengths in information technology and business process management (IT-BPM) and digital health care solutions.

data.title: Health groups urge shielding medical supplies, devices from counter-tariffs
data.summary: Although it’s not yet clear what products could be affected by future counter-tariffs, experts say some essential medications, medical devices and diagnostic imaging equipment often come from U.S. manufacturers
